mutation {
  grantAccessToDataproduct(
    input: {
        dataproductID: "{{ .pii_dataproduct_id }}"
        expires:"2048-12-24T00:00:00Z"
        subject: "santa@nav.no"
        subjectType: user
        polly: {
            id: "12345-12345-13455-13445"
            name: "Behandling"
            url: "https://some.url"
        }
    }
  ) {
    id
    subject
    granter
    expires
    revoked
    polly {
        id
        name
        url
    }
  }
}

RETURNS

OPTION data.grantAccessToDataproduct.id=IGNORE

ENDOPTS

{
  "data": {
    "grantAccessToDataproduct": {
      "subject": "user:santa@nav.no",
      "granter": "mock.anderson@email.com",
      "expires": "2048-12-24T00:00:00Z",
      "revoked": null,
      "polly": {
            "id": "12345-12345-13455-13445",
            "name": "Behandling",
            "url": "https://some.url"
        }
    }
  }
}

STORE access_id=data.grantAccessToDataproduct.id
